sentences.en: Buildings old and new are thickly covered with graffiti.
sentences.cn: 新旧建筑物都覆盖着密密麻麻的涂鸦。

sentences.en: I rounded a bend where the trees and brush grew thickly.
sentences.cn: 我在一个林木茂密的地方绕了个弯。

sentences.en: Lantana grows so thickly that young trees often fail to take root.
sentences.cn: 马缨丹长得很茂密，以至于幼树常常无法生根。
